metadata.title: CVE-2019-15604 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Improper Certificate Validation in Node.js 10, 12, and 13 causes the process to abort when sending a crafted X.509 certificate

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-15604` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode72 - 10.19.0~dfsg-3ubuntu1
nodejs - 10.19.0~dfsg-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.19.0~dfsg-3ubuntu1').
